name: Space & Soul
description:
The theme of the game is self-care and ship-care. The playable character is a self-proclaimed “space pirate” sailing through the galaxy in their ship heading toward the Space Pirate Convention. The player performs tasks to keep their player healthy and their ship from falling apart. Random events happen to keep the player busy, but they also will have down time to just relax and enjoy the freedom of space. The player’s goal is to take care of their ship long enough to get to the desired location.

A game made by Gabriel Alabastro, Josh Davis, and Trevor Curran as a part of Extra Credits Game Jam #6 2020.
